chapter.text: Lauxd est DI kre heavens ter far darkness light those disbelieve en their Lord ad deviate
Li est Unu kre vi kot tiam predetermined your life sxpin life sxpin ke kon nur al Him! Vi ad dub
Li est 1 DI heavens ter. Li kon your sekret your declarations Li kon cxio vi earn
Ne materi ki kind da proof ven them their Lord ili turn el gxi, aversion
Ekde ili rejected truth when gxi ven them ili incurred consequences their heedlessness

Ili ne seg kiel many generaci them ni annihilated Ni establ them ter plur than ni did vi ni dusx them blessings generously ni proviz them flu streams Ni tiam annihilated them their pek ni substituted another generaci their met
Eben ni send them physical libr skrib sur paper, ili tusx gxi their man those disbelieved dir This est ne plur than clever magic
Ili ankaux dir nur angxel ven him! Hav ni send angxel whole materi terminated ili ne long respited
Hav ni send angxel ni send him form hom ni kept them just as konfuz as ili konfuz nun
Messengers vi ridiculed est those mok them sufer consequences de their ridiculing
Dir Roam ter not consequences rejectors
Dir, "Al whom aparten cxio heavens ter? Dir, "Al DI. Li dekret mercy est His atribu! Li surely summon vi all Tag Resurrection est inevitable. Unu perd their anim est those disbelieve
Al Him aparten cxio logx en nokt tag! Li est Hearer Knower
dir Shall mi akcept DI as Lord Mastr when Li est Initiator de heavens ter Li feeds ne fed Dir mi komand plej devoted submitter ne est idol worshiper
dir mi tim se mi disobeyed my Lord retribution awesome tag
Whoever sxpar (retribution) ke tag ating His mercy! this est greatest triumf
Di tusx vi adversity neniom relieve gxi escept Li. Kaj se Li tusx vi ben Li est Omnipotent
Li est Supreme His creatures. Li est plej Sagx Cognizant

Dir Whose testimony est greatest? Dir di! Li est witness me vi ke this Quran inspir me predik gxi vi whomever gxi reaches Ja vi bor witness tie est ali di DI. Dir mi ne atest as vi do tie est nur unu di mi disown your idolatry
Those ni don scripture recognize this as ili recognize their own infan. Unu perd their anim est those ne kred
Who evil than unu est mensog DI rejects His revelations? transgressors neniam sukces
Tag when ni summon them all ni pet idol worshipers vol idols vi est set
Their disastrous response est DI our Lord ni neniam est idol worshipers
Not kiel ili lied al themselves kaj kiel idols ili invent abandoned them

Kelk da them auxskult al vi ni ej vual their kor prevent them kompren deafness en their orel! Tiel ne materi ki kind da proof ili seg ili ne kred! Do when ili ven argue vi disbelievers dir These est tales preter
Ili repel others el this (Quran) as ili rest for el gxi, do ili nur detru sen perceiving
Nur vi seg them when ili vizagx hellfire! Ili dir tiam Ve al us. Oh ni wish ni ir neniam reject our Lord's revelations join believers
As a materi da fakt, (ili nur dir this their sekret exposed Ili ir ili commit exactly sam krim. Ili est liars)
Ili dir (subconsciously) Ni viv nur this life; ni ne resurrected
Vi nur seg them when ili star their Lord Li dir Est this ne truth? Ili dir Jes our Lord Li dir Vi incurred retribution your disbelief
Losers ja est those disbelieve meeting DI Hor ven them suddenly tiam dir Ni deeply bedauxr wasting our viv en this mond. Ili port loads their pek their dors; ki miserable load
life this mond est ne plur than iluzi vanity while abode Hereafter est far put por des righteous. Vi ne kompren
Ni kon ti vi saddened ki ili dir Vi kon ti gxi ne est vi ke ili reject gxi est di revelations ke wicked disregard
Messengers vi rejected ili steadfastly persevered en des vizagx de rejection. Ili persekut our victory ven them. Such est di sistem neniam sxangx. Histori My messengers tiel sets precedents vi

their rejection gets est tro mult vi vi kon ke eben vi fos tunnel ter grimp ladder cxiel produkt mirakl them (ili ankoraux ne kred)! Hav DI willed Li direkt them unanimously! Do ne behave like ignorant unu
Nur unu al respond est those auxskult! DI resurrects dead ILI ultimately return Him
Ili dir nur nepr sign ven him his Lord Dir DI est able al send sign plej de them ne kon
All creatures ter all bird flug kun wings est communities vi. Ni ne las anything this libr. Al their Lord all these creatures summoned
Those reject our proofs est surd dumb en total darkness. Whomever DI vol Li send astray whomever Li vol Li plumb rekt path
Dir Ki se di retribution ven vi Hor ven vi vi implore DI vi est truthful
Fakt est nur Him vi implore Li respond your prayer se Li vol vi forges your idols
Ni send (messengers) communities vi ni put them al test tra adversity hardship ili implore
Se nur ili implored when our test aflikt them! Instead their kor hard diabl ornam their works their okul
When ili tiel disregard message don them ni open por them gates de cxio. Tiam just as ili gxoj en ki don them ni pun them suddenly ili igx utterly stunned
wicked est tiel annihilated Lauxd est DI Lord univers
Dir Ki se DI sorb for your auxd your eyesight sigel your mens; which di DI restore these vi? Not kiel ni eksplik revelations not kiel ili ankoraux deviate
Dir Ki se di retribution ven vi suddenly post announcement gxi ne wicked who est incur annihilation
Ni ne send messengers deliverers bon news tro warners. Those kred reform hav nothing tim nor vol ili grieve
As por those reject our revelations ili incur retribution their wickedness
dir mi ne dir al vi ke mi posed trezor DI. Nor do mi kon future Nor do mi dir al vi mi est angxel. Mi simply sekv ki revealed me Dir est Est blind sam as seer? Vi ne reflect
Kaj predik this (Quran) al those reverence summoning their Lord - Ili hav neniom Him as Lord kaj Mastr nor intercessor! - Ke ili ating salvation
Ne dismiss those implore their Lord tag kaj nokt, devoting Him sol! Vi ne est responsible por their reckoning nor est ili responsible por your reckoning Vi dismiss them vi est transgressor
Ni tiel test popol per each ali let them dir (mockingly) Est these popol us ben DI? est Est DI ne aware da appreciative unu

When those kred en our revelations ven vi vi dir Salmun ‘Alaykum (Pac est vi). Your Lord dekret mercy est His atribu. Do anyone among vi commits transgression ignorance pent thereafter reforms tiam Li Forgiving Merciful
Ni tiel eksplik revelations pint voj de des wicked
dir mi forbidden el worshipping ki vi worship DI. Dir mi ne sekv your opinions! Otherwise mi ir astray ne direkt
dir mi hav solid proof el my Lord vi rejected gxi! Mi ne control retribution vi challenge me bring Judgment aparten DI sol. Li narrates truth Li est bon jugx
Dir Se mi controlled retribution vi challenge me bring whole materi terminated long ago! DI kon PUT who wicked est
Kun Him est klav al all sekret; neniom kon them Li. Li kon cxio sur land mar. Ne foli fal His knowledge. Nor est tie gren depths soil Nor est tie anything wet sek ke ne recorded profound record
Li est Unu puts vi al death nokt kon eben smallest de your actions tag. Li resurrects vi cxiu maten your life sxpin fulfilled tiam Him est your ultimate return Li tiam inform vi de cxio vi done
Li est Supreme His creatures Li appoints gard protekt vi! When appointed temp death ven any da vi our messengers put him death sen delay
Tiam everyone returned DI their rightful Lord Mastr Absolutely Li est ultimate jugx; Li est plej accurate Reckoner
Dir Who sav vi darkness de land mar? Vi implore Him loudly secretly Li sav us this temp ni est eternally appreciative
Dir DI sav vi this temp, ali temp ankaux tiam vi ankoraux set idols Him
dir Li est certainly able al versx upon vi retribution el super vi el beneath your fut! Li divid vi factions hav vi gust each others' tyranny! Not kiel ni eksplik revelations ili kompren
Your popol rejected this eben gxi est truth. dir mi est guardian over vi
Cxiu prophecy herein ven pas vi testament surely trov out
Se vi seg those mok our revelations vi evit them ili delve into another subjekt. Diabl kauxz vi forges tiam vi memor do ne sid such evil popol
righteous est ne responsible utterances de those popol gxi help remind them; perhaps ili sav

Vi disregard those pren their religi en vain as est social funkci totally sorb en this worldly life. Remind this (Quran) lest anim sufer consequences its evil earnings Gxi hav neniom DI Lord kaj Mastr nor intercessor! Gxi ofert any kind da ransom gxi ne akcept! Ili sufer consequences evil works ili earn ili incurred hellish drink painful retribution their disbelief

dir ni implore DI Shall ki ne posed potenc benefit us dolor us turn our kalkan DI direkt us? Tiam ni join those posed diabl rendered utterly konfuz while their amik pen sav them ‘Rest us tuj path ' Dir di guidance est dekstr guidance! Ni komand submit Lord univers
Al observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) al reverence Him - Li est 1 antaux whom vi summoned reckoning

Li est Unu kre heavens ter truthfully. Whenever Li dir Est gxi est His vort est absolut truth. All sovereignty aparten al Him tag korn blov! Knower de all sekret declarations Li est plej Sagx Cognizant
Recall ti Abraham dir al his patr Azar Kiel vi worship statu di? Mi seg ke vi your popol ir far astray
Ni montr Abraham mir de heavens ter ben him certainty
When nokt fal li seg lum planed. Maybe this est my Lord li dir. When gxi disappeared li dir mi ne like (di) disappear
When li seg lun roz li dir Maybe this est my Lord When gxi disappeared li dir my Lord direkt me mi est strayers
When li seg sun roz li dir This est my Lord This est grand. when gxi set li dir O my popol mi denunc your idolatry
Mi devoted absolutely Unu iniciat heavens ter; mi neniam est idol worshiper
His popol argued him. Li dir Do vi argue me DI Li direkt me Mi ne hav tim de idols vi set Nothing okaz me unless my Lord vol gxi. My Lord's knowledge encompasses all ajx. Vi ne pren heed
Why mi tim your idols? est vi est afraid ekde vi worship DI idols est utterly powerless help vi! Which flank est ind de security se vi kon
Those kred ne pollute their belief idol worship ind perfekt security ili ver direkt
Such est our argument which ni supported Abraham his popol. Ni exalt whomever ni do gxi alt rang. Your Lord est Sagx Omniscient
Ni granted him Isaac Jacob ni direkt ambaux them! Similarly ni direkt Noah antaux ke, his descendants (ni direkt) David Solomon Job Joseph Moses Aaron. Ni tiel rekompenc des righteous
Ankaux Zachariah John Jesus Elias all est righteous
Ismail Elisha Jonah Lot; each da these NI DISTING all POPOL
El their ancestors their descendants their siblings ni chose many ni direkt them rekt path
Such est di guidance which Li direkt whomever Li chooses His servants. any da them fal idolatry their works nullified
Those est des unu ni don scripture wisdom prophethood. these popol disbelieve ni substitute others their met neo popol ne est disbelievers
These est unu direkt per DI; vi direkt their footsteps. dir mi ne pet vi any wage This est message all popol

(Ili neniam valued DI as Li valued Tiel ili dir DI ne reveal anything any human est Dir Who tiam revealed scripture Moses brought light guidance popol? Vi put gxi down sur paper proklam gxi while concealing a lot de gxi! Vi instru ki vi neniam kon - Vi your parents Dir DI est 1 who revealed gxi) tiam las them their heedlessness lud

This tro est ben scripture ni revealed konfirm previous scriptures ke vi avert plej grav community all those around gxi. Those kred en Hereafter kred en this (scripture) observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat)

Who est evil than 1 who fabricates mensog atribu them DI dir mi ricev divine inspiration when ne such inspiration don him dir mi skrib sam as di revelations? nur vi seg transgressors death! Angxel etend their man al them dir Let ir da your anim! Hodiaux vi incurred shameful retribution por dir DI truth kaj est tro arrogant akcept His revelations
Vi ven us individu just as ni kre vi 1 temp vi las ki ni proviz por vi. Ni do ne seg vi intercessors vi idolized pretend ke ili help vi! All lig vi severed idols vi set abandoned vi
DI EST UNU KAUXZ GREN seeds KRAK germinate! Li produkt viv dead dead el viv Such est DI; kiel could vi deviate
Je krak dawn Li ig maten emerge Li far nokt ankoraux Li rendered sun lun dejxor as calculation devices Such est desegn Almighty Omniscient
Kaj Li est Unu far stel direkt vi darkness sur land kaj sur mar Ni tiel clarify revelations popol kon
Li iniciat vi 1 ul decid your path ankaux as your final destiny. Ni tiel clarify revelations popol kompren

Li est Unu send cxiel akv whereby ni produkt all kinds da plant. Ni produkt verd sxtof multitudes kompleks gren palm arb pend clusters gxarden grapes oliv granat; frukt ke est simil dissimilar Not their frukt as ili kresk ripen These est sign popol kred
Ili set DI idols jinns Li est Unu kre them. Ili ecx atribu al Him fil daughters any knowledge! Li glor. Li est plej Alt far super their pretend
Initiator de heavens ter. Kiel Li can fil when Li hav neniam hav mate Li kre all ajx Li est fully aware da all ajx
Such est DI your Lord tie ne est di escept Li Creator all ajx! Vi worship Him sol. Li est en control de all ajx
Ne vizi encompass Him Li encompasses all vizi! Li est Compassionate Cognizant
Enlightenments ven vi your Lord As por those seg ili do por their own bon those turn blind do tial their own detriment. Mi ne est your guardian
Ni tiel eksplik revelations pruv ti vi ricev knowledge clarify them popol kon
Sekv ki revealed vi your Lord tie ne est di escept Li disregard idol worshipers
Hav DI willed ili ne worshipped idols! Ni ne appoint vi their guardian nor est vi their advokat
Ne curse idols ili set DI lest ili blaspheme curse DI ignorance! Ni ornam works de cxiu grup en their okul. Ultimately ili return their Lord tiam Li inform them de cxio ili done
Ili jxur DI solemnly mirakl ven them ili surely kred. Dir Mirakl ven nur el DI. all vi kon mirakl did ven them ili ad disbelieve
Ni control their mens their kor Do ekde their decision est disbelieve ni las them their transgressions blundering
Eben se ni send angxel them; eben dead parol al them; eben ni summoned cxiu mirakl them; ili ne kred unless DI vol gxi. Ja plej de them est ignorant
Ni permes enemies cxiu prophet - human jinn diabl - Al inspir each ali rev vort en ord tromp! Hav your Lord willed ili ne done gxi! Vi disregard them their fabrications
This est let mens de those ne kred en Hereafter auxskult al such fabrications akcept them tiel expose their efektiv convictions
Mi streb DI source legx when Li revealed vi this libr fully detal? Those ricev scripture recognize gxi hav revealed your Lord truthfully. Vi ne haven any dub
Vort your Lord est komplet en truth justice Nothing abrogate His vort. Li est Hearer Omniscient
Vi obe majority popol ter ili divert vi path DI. Ili sekv nur konjekt; ili nur diven
Your Lord est fully aware da those stray His path Li est fully aware da those direkt
Vi mangx el ke upon which di nom prononc vi ver kred en His revelations
Why vi ne mangx el ke upon which di nom menci? Li detal vi ki prohibited vi unless vi forced Ja many popol mislead others their personal opinions knowledge. Your Lord est fully aware da transgressors
Vi evit obvious pek tro fel unu. Those earned pek surely pag por their transgressions
Ne mangx el ke upon which nom DI ne menci gxi est abomen! Diabl inspir their allies argue vi; vi obe them vi est idol worshipers
est dead ni granted him life est proviz him light ke enables him mov among des popol, egal al unu total darkness el which li neniam exit works disbelievers tiel ornam their okul
Ni allow konduk criminals cxiu community plot scheme Ili nur plot scheme their own anim sen perceiving

When powerful proof ven al them ili dir Ni ne kred ni don ki don di messengers! DI kon exactly who est bon qualified liver His message Such criminals sufer debasement DI terrible retribution consequence their evil scheming
Whomever DI vol direkt Li renders his kest largx open al Submission. whomever Li vol send astray Li renders his kest intolerant straitened unu grimp tial. DI TIEL EJ curse upon those RIFUZ kred
This est rekt path your Lord Ni eksplik revelations popol pren heed
Ili ind abode pac their Lord Li est their Lord Mastr rekompenc their works

Tag ven when Li summons all da them dir O vi jinns vi pretend multitudes humans Their human companions dir Our Lord ni gxu each others' kompani ni wasted life sxpin Vi set us Li dir Infer est your destiny Ili abide therein forever en accordance kun di testament Your Lord est Sagx Omniscient
Ni tiel alumet wicked est companions de each ali as punishment their transgressions

O vi jinns humans vi ne ricev messengers el vi narrated vi My revelations avert vi meeting this tag? Ili dir Ni urs witness ourselves. Ili totally preoccupied worldly life ili bor witness themselves ili est disbelievers
This est montr ke your Lord neniam annihilates any community unjustly while its popol est unaware
Everyone ating rang commensurate their deeds. Your Lord est neniam unaware de anything ili do
Your Lord est Ricx 1; possessor all mercy. Li vol Li remove vi substitute whomever Li vol your met just as Li produkt vi progeny ali popol
Ki promes vi ven pas vi neniam evade gxi
dir O my popol do your bon tial vol mi. Vi do gxi surely trov out who ultimate victors est. Certainly wicked vol neniam sukces

Ili ecx set aside akci di provisions de crops livestock dir This akci aparten al DI their pretend this akci aparten al our idols. Tamen ki est set aside their idols neniam reached DI while akci ili set aside DI invariably ir their idols! Miserable ja est their judgment

Tiel est idol worshipers duped their idols extent killing their own infan. En fakt, their idols inflict great pain them konfuz their religi them. Hav DI willed ili ne done gxi! Vi disregard them their fabrications

Ili dir These est livestock crops ke prohibited ne 1 mangx them whomever ni permes ili pretend! Ili ankaux prohibited vetur nepr livestock. Eben livestock ili mangx ili neniam prononc di nom as ili ofer them. Such est innovations atribu al Him. Li surely requite them their innovations

Ili ankaux dir Ki est bellies de these livestock rezerv exclusively vir us kaj prohibited our wives est ankoraux nask ili permes their wives akci therein. Li certainly requite them their innovations. Li est Sagx Omniscient
Losers ja est those killed their infan foolishly their lack knowledge prohibited ki DI hav proviz por them sekv innovations atribu al DI! Ili ir astray; ili ne direkt
Li est Unu establ gxarden trellised untrellised palm arb crops different gust oliv granat! - Frukt est simil dissimilar Mangx their frukt don due alms tag rikolt ne waste anything! Li ne am wasters
Kelk livestock supply vi transportation ankaux as lit sxtof! Mangx di provisions vi ne sekv sxtup Satan; li est your ardent enemy
kinds livestock 2 kinds sxaf 2 kinds kapr dir Est gxi 2 vir Li prohibited 2 females kontent wombs 2 females? Tell me ki vi kon vi est truthful

Regarding 2 kinds kamel 2 kinds bov dir Est gxi 2 vir Li prohibited 2 females kontent wombs 2 females? Vi est witnesses when DI dekret such prohibitions vi? Who evil than those invent such mensog est atribu them DI? Ili tiel mislead popol knowledge. DI NE DIREKT such evil POPOL

Dir mi ne trov revelations don me any food ke prohibited any eater (1) carrion (2) kur sang (3) viand pork gxi contaminated (4) viand best blasphemously dedicx DI. 1 forced mangx these) sen est deliberate malic tiam your Lord est Forgiver Merciful
those who Jewish ni prohibited best undivided huf; de bov sxaf ni prohibited fat which port their dors viscera miks ost! Ke est retribution their transgressions ni est truthful
Ili disbelieve vi tiam dir Your Lord posed infinite mercy His retribution est unavoidable por kulp popol

idol worshipers dir Hav DI willed ni ne practice idolatry nor would our parents nor would ni prohibit anything. Do did those antaux them disbelieve gxis ili incurred our retribution! Dir vi hav any proven knowledge ke vi montr us? Vi sekv nothing konjekt; vi nur diven
Dir DI posed plej powerful argument; Li vol Li direkt all da vi
dir Bring your witnesses atest DI prohibited this ke. ili atest do ne atest them! Nor shall vi sekv opinions de those reject our revelations those disbelieve Hereafter those stray for their Lord

dir Ven let me tell vi ki your Lord really prohibited vi Vi ne set idols Him! Vi honor your parents Vi ne kill your infan el tim de poverty! - Ni proviz por vi kaj them. Vi ne commit gross pek obvious fel Vi ne kill - DI FAR life SANKT - Escept justice These est His commandments al vi vi kompren

Vi ne tusx orf mon escept plej righteous manier ili reach maturity. Vi don plen weight plen mezur when vi meti equitably. Ni ne sxargx any anim its means Vi est absolutely just when vi bor witness eben your relativ. Vi fulfill your covenant DI. These est His commandments al vi ke vi pren heed
This est My path - Rekt 1. Vi sekv gxi ne sekv any ali paths lest ili divert vi His path. These est His commandments al vi vi sav
Ni don Moses scripture komplet put commandments detal cxio beacon mercy ke ili kred en meeting their Lord
This tro est ben scripture ke ni revealed vi sekv gxi plumb righteous life ke vi ating mercy
Tuj vi ne long dir scripture send down 2 grup antaux us, ni est unaware de their teachings

Nor can vi dir nur scripture ven us ni bon direkt than ili. proven scripture hav nun ven vi your Lord beacon mercy! tuj who evil than unu est rejects these proofs el DI disregards them? Ni commit those disregard our proofs mav retribution their heedlessness

Ili waiting angxel est ven them your Lord kelk physical manifestations your Lord Tag this ne okaz anim do gxi benefit el kred gxi ne kred antaux ke, ne reap benefits belief per plumb righteous life! dir Keep waiting ni tro waiting
Those divid sects do ne aparten vi! Their judgment ripoz DI tiam Li inform them de cxio ili done
Whoever does righteous work ricev rekompenc 10 1 who commits pek requited nur 1! Ne 1 sufer slightest injustice
Dir My Lord direkt me rekt path! - Perfekt religi Abraham monotheism. Li neniam est idol worshiper
Dir My Kontakt Prayers (Salat) my worship practices my life my death est all devoted absolutely al DI sol Lord univers
Li ne hav partner This est ki mi komand kred mi est 1 submit
dir mi streb DI lord when Li est Lord all ajx? Ne anim benefits el its own works neniom bor sxargx de another Ultimately vi return your Lord tiam Li inform vi all your disput
Li est Unu far vi inheritors ter Li raised kelk da vi others en rang en ord test vi en accordance kun ki Li don vi! Surely your Lord est efficient en enforcing retribution Li est Forgiver Merciful
